hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | grep -q "^git commit" && (bun run lint 1>/dev/null; [ $? -eq 1 ] && echo '{"decision":"block","reason":"Lint errors found. Fix them before committing."}' && exit 2) || true
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".js") or endswith(".ts") or endswith(".jsx") or endswith(".tsx"))' | xargs -r pnpm biome format --write
